entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 08:00 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this morning. High 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
